actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-549.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 406 - 0 (Record Vote No: 99).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4421) to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1987, 1988, 1989, and 1990 to carry out the Head Start, Follow Through, dependent care, community services block grant, and community food and nutrition programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4421 (public assistance programs funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4421) to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1987, 1988, 1989, and 1990 to carry out the Head Start, Follow Through, dependent care, community services block grant, and community food and nutrition programs, and for other purposes.
